mapper.select: SELECT s.student_id studentId, s.student_name studentName, s.student_gender studentGender, (SELECT if((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM account a INNER JOIN answer_sheet an ON a.account_id = an.account_id INNER JOIN multiplechoice m ON an.multiplechoice_no = m.multiplechoice_no WHERE s.student_id = an.account_id AND an.multiplechoice_no = m.multiplechoice_no) > 0, '제출', '미제출')) AS submissionStatus FROM student s INNER JOIN class_registration c ON s.student_id = c.account_id WHERE c.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} AND c.class_registration_state = '수강중';
